definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: When you climb up to the balcony of the drum tower, you are at the central point of Old Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 登上鼓楼的观景台，你就站在了天津的中心。

sentences.english: The viewing deck The dam hindering river becomes the viewing deck for tourists.
sentences.chinese: 《观景台》拦河的水堤，成了游客的观景台。

sentences.english: The viewing deck The dam hindering river becomes the viewing deck for tourists.
sentences.chinese: 《观景台》拦河的水堤，成了游客的观景台。

sentences.english: On the observation deck , people can see all of the city, water, and mountains.
sentences.chinese: 在观景台，人们可以看到城市的所有水和山。

sentences.english: City from Frankfurt Main Tower observation deck.
sentences.chinese: 在法兰克福美茵大厦观景台上眺望整个城市。

sentences.english: The peak tower viewing platform shrouded in night Ambilight in.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的太平山顶凌霄阁观景台笼罩在流光溢彩中。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, it has an observation deck and polite guards.
sentences.chinese: 令人惊讶的是，它有一个观景台和礼貌的警卫。

definition: to overlook/to look down from a height
plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
